newsitem.title: USA: Bay Networks completes LANcity acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Bay Networks completes LANcity acquisition.

text.p: SANTA CLARA, Calif., Sept. 25 Bay Networks Inc said Wednesday it has completed its $59 million cash acquisition of LANcity Corp, a vendor of cable TV modem technology based in Andover, Mass.

LANcity and its 45 employees will operate as the cable access division within Bay Networks' Internet/Telecom Business Unit. It's founder, Rouzbeh Yassini, will become division vice president and general manager.
The acquisition gives Bay Networks the ability to deliver two-way, high-speed data and multimedia transmission over the existing cable TV lines to homes, offices and other receivers.
